MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL63 postcode area of Ty Croes affecting properties in Brynteg Estate and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:19am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:14am on 10th March 2021.
